Scheduling  


We've been looking for ways to provide quicker and easier access to our seasonal key dates for all of our seasonal leagues and tournaments, but for now, you can find everything you need to know scheduling-wise for the entire season, here!

Regular Season Dates
Sun 05/03/23 - Thurs 20/04/23

Round 1: Sun 5th Mar Thurs 9th Mar 2023

Round 2: Sun 12th Mar Thurs 16th Mar 2023

Round 3: Sun 19th Mar Thurs 23rd Mar 2023

Round 4: Sun 26th Mar Thurs 30th Apr 2022

Round 5: Sun 2nd Apr - Thurs 6th Apr 2023

Round 6: Sun 9th Apr - Thurs 13th Apr 2023

Round 7: Sun 16th Apr - Thurs 20th Apr 2023

Playoffs Dates
Sun 23/04/23 - Thurs 11/05/23

Page Playoffs: Sun 23rd Apr - Thurs 27th Apr 2023

Semi-Finals: Sun 30th Apr - Thurs 4th May 2023

Grand Finals: Sun 7th May - Thurs 11th May 2023

Transfer Window dates and Weekly Fixtures details will be confirmed after Summer Cup.

--- ### Match Details This match is to be played between **Sunday the 12th of March** and **Thursday the 16th of March 2023**. --- ### Reminders - During Sixes Season 36 we plan on conducting random demo checks to ensure players are recording POV demos. Please ensure that you are recording match demos in order to avoid punishment. - If you are unsure of whether or not something is considered a game exploit, contact a League Administrator for clarification. Ignorance is not an excuse.
